data.title: Marathon Center for the Performing Arts
data.text:
PLEASE NOTE: We can only guarantee that tickets purchased through the MCPA Ticket Office are valid.

Tickets purchased through secondary sources/reseller sites (i.e. Ticket Center, Ticketmaster, StubHub, Vivid Seat, etc.) may or may not be legitimate, and we cannot resolve issues involving them.

These resale websites often are the first to appear in your internet search.

If you’re not on MCPA.org, you are on the wrong website to purchase tickets and you are probably overpaying!

By entering the premises of Marathon Center for the Performing Arts (MCPA), you understand that you may be photographed, filmed, or videotaped and you hereby give MCPA the unqualified right to take pictures and/or recordings of you and grant the perpetual right to use your likeness, image, photo (collectively, “image”), without compensation, for broadcast or exhibition in any medium and to put the finished pictures/recordings to any legitimate use without limitation or reservation. You hereby waive, release and forever discharge MCPA from and against any and all claims or actions arising out of or resulting from any use of your image. MCPA shall not be obligated to use and may elect not to use your image.
